title: Stuck at 33% calculating differences
body:
Its been 5 hours since I tried to patch it
It was going good at first then it stopped at 98% for some reason and then something popped out saying error 
It didn't gave much choices so I clicked retry, so it started at 33% it was taking ages so I went for a nap/sleep, when I woke up it was still at 33% and 19k files scanned but now its 25k files scanned

What should I do? D:

replies.body:
You don't need to reinstall the whole game, just the patcher.
go to the riot games folder then league of legends then RADS then Projects and delete the folders lol_patcher and lol_launcher.
then start your client normally through your desktop icon and wait for it to load.

this fix solves most patch related problems.

Hey there,

How long has it been scanning files for? The patcher will continue to scan the installation directory for damaged files when attempting a repair until it finds something wrong, then it will begin scanning again from the first file.

I would suggest allowing it to complete, or if you're impatient perhaps [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
I'm trying to repair it, thank you for your suggestions :)
